meanings.sent1: The yellowish flower brightened up the garden.
meanings.sent2: Her dress had a yellowish tint that matched the sunshine.
meanings.sent3: The yellowish banana tried to blend in with the lemons.
meanings.sent4: The yellowish sky at sunset painted a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent5: The yellowish paint on the walls gave the room a warm glow.

meanings.sent1: His yellowish hair shone under the sun.
meanings.sent2: The sky turned yellowish as the storm approached.
meanings.sent3: The yellowish leaves danced in the autumn breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her yellowish smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The yellowish glow of the streetlights guided us home.
